channel.title: Making the server available for others
channel.description:
How do I make a Website that has -Homepage -Forums -voting -Donating -Webclient
And also How Do I create a webclient.
Plz help and If there is already a tutorial plz give me the link. Thanks in advance :)

item.title: Making the server available for others
item.dc:creator: @Glazy Glazy
item.description:
@Glazy wrote:

If I were you if you don’t know anything about HTML use a hosts website builder. Also just look around the tutorials section of this forum. I’m sure there is guides to starting up a RSPS.

Read full topic
